title: AI-Enhanced Social Studies Instructional Design: Activity Theory-Based Case Study

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Access via personal devices, with a focus on practical AI tool-based lesson design.

learning_goals: Learners can apply the six components of activity theory (subject, tool, object, rules, community, division of labor) to social studies lesson design.
Learners can generate at least three core concepts and activity ideas for social studies units using ChatGPT.
Learners can critically evaluate and adapt AI-generated content to educational contexts.
Learners can submit a complete social studies lesson design plan by combining peer feedback and AI tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
